entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-08-19
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Retrieving file from new resource file format throws System.MissingMethodException: 'Constructor on type 'System.Byte[]' not found.' #106671
  • [8.0] Build failure in Workloads-NoWebcil-Wasm.Build.NativeRebuild.Tests.OptimizationFlagChangeTests #106663
  • .NET 8.0.401 + macOS crashes, while .NET 8.0.303 doesn't. #106661
  • [apple-mobile][infra] Validate possibility of updating runtime queues from XCode 14 to 15 and iOS/tvOS 16 to 17 #106650
    9.0.0
  • Add readme for ILLink.Tasks package #106647
    10.0.0
  • JIT: Model `Int64/UInt64 -> Single` casts without intermediate cast to `Double` #106646
  • Return from hardware exception signal handler before processing an exception on Unix #106645
    Future
  • [API Proposal]: ArrayRecord.TotalElementsCount #106644
    9.0.0
  • Invalid Environment.ProcessorCount on AMD EPYC 9554. Shows 64 instead of 128 #106642
  • Behavior change in NullabilityInfoContext between .NET 8 and .NET 9 #106636
    Future
  • [Test Failure] NoCallback_RevokedCertificate_NoRevocationChecking_Succeeds on Alpine #106634
  • Investigate System.Lazy<,> type not found when comparing netstandard2.0 against NetCoreAppCurrent #106628
    10.0.0
  • 'chrome-GetPropertiesTests' timing out #106625
    10.0.0
  • 25% regression in string search benchmark #106624
    9.0.0
  • ARM64 SVE: GatherVectorWithByteOffsetFirstFaulting failures during stress testing #106621
    9.0.0
  • Serializing Dictionary with nulls with JsonIgnoreCondition.WhenWritingNull emits null values. #106617
  • [Feature Request] Direct Linq support for Memory and Span #106611
  • JIT: Bad codegen with `Avx512DQ.VL.Range` #106610
    9.0.0
  • JIT: Assertion failed 'link' during 'Optimize Valnum CSEs' #106609
    9.0.0
  • JIT: `ArgumentOutOfRangeException` in debug but not release with `DotProductBySelectedQuadruplet` #106608
    10.0.0
  • Infinite loop inside CodeGen::genCreateAddrMode while JIT optimizing #106607
    9.0.0
  • Test failure: JIT/Directed/tailcall/mutual_recursion/mutual_recursion.cmd #106603
    9.0.0
  • Test failure: baseservices/RuntimeConfiguration/TestConfigTester/TestConfigTester.cmd #106602
  • Test failure: JIT/Directed/tailcall/mutual_recursion/mutual_recursion.cmd #106601

Closed

  • StackOverflowException in Configuration.Binder source generator #103802
    9.0.0
  • Reduced .NET8 R2R performance #96242
    9.0.0
  • ILLink doesn't track generic instantiation through GetType() #105345
    10.0.0
  • Method body scanner cannot determine static type of return value from IEnumerator<T>.get_Current #93719
    Future
  • Zlib-ng compilation fails on Raspbian ARM32 system #106584
  • ZipFile.ExtractToDirectory doc comments wrongly claim that the directory must not exist #95501
    9.0.0
  • [ILLink] TrimMode=full is trimming UnmanagedCallersOnly in the final app #106627
  • ILLink analyzer: implement warnings for DAM on type #104742
    10.0.0
  • ILLink: Trim analyzer doesn't warn on reflection access to annotated members when the source of the `Type` is GetType on a DAM-annotated class #102002
    10.0.0
  • WASM: Satellite resources not read as expected in .net9.0 preview7 #106456
  • How to use CancellationToken with HttpClient #106558
    Future
  • Timeout at System.Net.Http.Functional.Tests.HttpClientHandlerTest_Http3.SendMoreThanStreamLimitRequestsConcurrently_LastWaits #106596
    10.0.0
  • Problem with hitting breakpoints while using Firefox or Firefox Developer Edition in InteractiveWebAssembly render mode, but no issues when using Microsoft Edge or Google Chrome. #106470
    Future
  • wasi interop failed to work after .net 9 preview 7 release #106523
    10.0.0
  • Package readmes are broken #106585
    9.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Expose TLS details for QUIC connection #70184
    Future
  • SYSLIB0057 (X509Certificate2 ctor is obsolete) errors in runtime code base #106472
    10.0.0
  • Nested classes in System.Runtime.Intrinsics are missing xml doc comments #83165
    9.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix dataflow warnings for invalid trim annotations #106672
    area-Tools-ILLink
  • [release/9.0] Test fix: Fix IOCP count config var test #106670
    area-System.Threading, 9.0.0
  • [release/9.0-rc1] Test fix: Fix IOCP count config var test #106669
    area-System.Threading, 9.0.0
  • [release/9.0] Fix stack overflow in the configuration source gen #106668
    area-Extensions-Configuration
  • [release/8.0-staging] Fix Type System Equivalence Checks #106667
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • [release/9.0-rc1] Fix Type System Equivalence Checks #106666
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • Fix invalid handle bug happening when `TypeBuilder` type used in exception catch clause #106665
    area-System.Reflection.Emit
  • Fix IOCP count config var test #106664
    area-System.Threading, 10.0.0
  • [cdac] Remove extra [] in array type name #106662
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • [mono][mini][arm64] Interlocked.CompareExchange for byte/sbyte #106660
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • Delete workaround for classic zlib #106659
    area-System.IO.Compression
  • Mark Encoding as nullable in StreamWriter's constructor #106658
    area-System.IO, community-contribution, 10.0.0
  • [release/9.0] [release/9.0-rc1] Fix Issue #105820 #106656
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Explicitly use para separators in the System.Runtime.Intrinsics XML docs #106652
    documentation, area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics
  • Add tests for trim warnings for marking types by name #106651
    linkable-framework, needs-area-label
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/9.0-rc1' => 'release/9.0' #106649
    area-codeflow
  • Add Non-Faulting behaviour for Sve.LoadVector*NonFaulting*() #106648
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [release/9.0] Update `MethodTable::IsDynamicStatics` and `DacpMethodTableData::bIsDynamic` to return 0/1 instead of flag value #106643
    Servicing-approved, area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Add NativeRuntimeEventSource metadata to NativeAot CoreLib #106641
    area-System.Threading
  • [browser] Use current templates pack even for downlevel TFM #106639
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-browser
  • JIT: Put all CSEs into SSA #106637
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Disable NoCallback_RevokedCertificate_NoRevocationChecking_Succeeds test on Alpine #106635
    area-System.Net.Http
  • [WASI] improve pollable #106633
    arch-wasm, area-Interop-mono, os-wasi, 10.0.0
  • [WASI] improve UCO sample and WBT #106632
    arch-wasm, area-Interop-mono, os-wasi, 10.0.0
  • [NRBF] Address issues discovered by Threat Model #106629
    new-api-needs-documentation, binaryformatter-migration, area-System.Formats.Nrbf
  • [browser] disable trim warnings in unit tests #106623
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 10.0.0
  • [WIP][mono] Try enable fullAOT-llvm arm64 CI jobs #106615
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Rewrite profiler notify callbacks into managed #106604
    area-VM-coreclr, 10.0.0

Merged

  • Fix KMAC tests on Azure Linux #106565
    area-System.Security, test-enhancement
  • Fix error check for CipherUpdate #106657
    area-System.Security
  • Fix stack overflow in the configuration source gen #106511
    area-Extensions-Configuration, source-generator, 9.0.0
  • Fix Type System Equivalence Checks #106498
    area-crossgen2-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • [cdac] Fix building of method signature names for class type variables #106654
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Track generic instantiations in ILLink #106370
    linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink
  • Fix zlib-ng compilation on Raspberry Pi ARM32 #106586
    area-System.IO.Compression, community-contribution
  • [cdac] Add helper methods to Target for reading UTF-8/16 strings #106483
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Fix Issue #105820 #106440
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 10.0.0
  • [RISC-V][LoongArch64] Pass structs containing empty struct arrays according to integer calling convention #106266
    area-Interop-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-loongarch64, arch-riscv
  • Move GetMethodTable to JIT #105098
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 10.0.0
  • Define _REENTRANT for SUNOS #104527
    area-PAL-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [main] Add workflow file for interbranch merging #106616
    area-Infrastructure
  • Add Mono Jit Arm64 Runs #106640
    needs-area-label
  • [release/9.0-rc1] JIT: fix unused operand marking in LowerHWIntrinsicTernaryLogic #106574
    Servicing-approved, area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/9.0-rc1] Fix condition for adding package readmes #106592
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [release/9.0-rc1] Add workflow file for interbranch merging #106614
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure
  • Update workloads.csproj #106638
    needs-area-label
  • ILLink analyzer: add warnings for DAM on type #105994
    area-Meta
  • ARM64-SVE: Remove HW_Flag_HasEnumOperand #105702 #106622
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arm-sve, 10.0.0
  • Fix condition for adding package readmes #106590
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [ObjWriter/Mach-O] Mark non-global symbols as .private_extern to match ELF #106446
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Add N_NO_DEAD_STRIP flag to section symbols #106444
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Increase timeout for SendMoreThanStreamLimitRequestsConcurrently_LastWaits test #106612
    area-System.Net.Http
  • [RISC-V] Fix typo #106613
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • Fix TreatWarningsAsErrors for linux #106549
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Use .alt_entry on Apple platforms in assembly helpers #106442
    community-contribution, needs-area-label
  • Skip static constructors in DynamicallyAccessedMembersBinder #106541
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Fix GetTargetPath hook point #106553
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Ignore SYSLIB0057 obsoletion in wasm websocket tests #106527
    area-System.Net.Security
  • Clean-up System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript.Tests.csproj #106477
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript
  • Adjust the vector docs to use langword instead of cref to preserve generic type information where relevant #106561
    area-System.Numerics
  • Ensure XML doc comments exist for the nested classes and IsSupported properties for intrinsics #106091
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics

Updated

  • JIT: Cast UInt64 to Single directly during const folding #106419
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • Instrumentation #100294
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW
  • Make SafeEvpPKeyHandle.OpenKeyFromProvider throw PNSE on OSSL less than 3.0 #106397
    area-System.Security, 9.0.0
  • Target .NET 10 / net10.0 #106599
    area-Infrastructure
  • Fix SSPI ComputeIntegrityCheck with Sign level #105605
    area-System.Net.Security, community-contribution
  • Implement `ShuffleUnsafe` methods and optimise `Shuffle` for non-constant `indices` #99596
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, tenet-performance, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0' => 'release/6.0-staging' #106341
    Servicing-approved, area-codeflow
  • Ensure that integer parsing correctly handles non-zero fractional data #106506
    area-System.Runtime
  • Update RedHat 7 -> 8 -- release/6.0-staging #105063
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0' => 'release/8.0-staging' #106340
    Servicing-approved, area-codeflow
  • [cdac] Fix getting array function type in RuntimeTypeSystem.IsArrayMethod #106512
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Share implementation of GenerateGuidFromName with EventSourceGenerator.Parser and CoreLib #106519
    area-System.Diagnostics.Tracing
  • Copy published crossgen2 in artifacts/tests #80154
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Remove RuntimeHelpers.IsReference from NativeAOT #105118
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Add randomized allocation sampling #100356
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Bump versioning to .NET 10 #106421
    area-Infrastructure, 10.0.0
  • Run native aot runtime tests on cet compatible machines #105288
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • [Tar] Fill in the file size even if the file is empty. #106409
    community-contribution, area-System.Formats.Tar
  • Fix paltest_pal_sxs_test1 on illumos #105207
    area-PAL-coreclr, os-SunOS, community-contribution
  • Include libz.a in native aot packages #106569
    area-System.IO.Compression
  • Inline properties during importation #96325
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, Future
  • Fix up docs #106563
    area-Meta
  • [cdac] Basic ISOSDacInterface::GetMethodDescData #106413
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Split dotnet/runtime-only downlevel LibraryImport support into its own source generator #106436
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator, 10.0.0
  • add support of TLS 1.3 on macOS POC #104835
    area-System.Net.Security, os-mac-os-x
  • Try re-enabling some CoreCLR/NativeAOT tests #106514
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [wasm] Clean emsdk setup #106403
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • JIT: Emitting more push instructions based on the push size #106516
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Use ProjectReferences in inbox src projects #106329
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, 10.0.0
  • Use memfd_create when available #105178
    area-System.IO, community-contribution, 10.0.0
  • Add JIT Helpers for RISCV64 #106540
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • Add missing exception log for ILogger extension methods #106600
    area-Extensions-Logging, community-contribution
  • Remove the rest of the SimdAsHWIntrinsic support #106594
    area-CodeGen-coreclr

entry.title: dotnet/runtimelab - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-08-19
entry.content:
PullRequests

Updated

  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] support `System.Net.Http.HttpClient` on WASIp2 #2614
    area-NativeAOT-LLVM
  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] add support for building WASI and browser debug & release on Linux #2605
    area-NativeAOT-LLVM

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-08-19
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Change how the helix tests work with the framework package in CI #42845
  • I'm stuck in "Interact with data in Blazor web apps" learning path. #42844
  • Reenable the `Microsoft.DotNet.Cli.Run.Tests.GivenDotnetRunBuildsCsproj.ItDefaultsToTheFirstUsableLaunchProfile` test #42841
  • `dotnet restore -v:n` doesn't show the log #42835

Closed

  • dotnet build/restore/run is not working #42831
  • NuGetAuditSuppress is ignored by dotnet list package #42832
  • [iOS] Net 9 Preview 7, iOS app in Release will crash when UseInterpreter is set to true #42752
  • CopyDocumentationFilesFromPackages behave different in docker #42825

PullRequests

Created

  • re-enable the framework hosted compiler test #42843
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.4xx' => 'release/9.0.1xx' #42837
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Add RemoveJsonPropertyPostAction for symmetry with AddJsonPropertyPos… #42836
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Remove locale from diagnostic-ids link #42830
    untriaged, Area-ApiCompat

Merged

  • Fix the cppcli tests by upgrading to preview 7 in stage 0 #42822
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Re-enable a torn SDK test #42829
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Merging internal commits for release/8.0.4xx #42701
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [release/9.0.1xx-rc1] .NET Source-Build 9.0.100-preview.7.24407.1 August 2024 Updates #42834
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Backport of auditSources fix #42826
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Create Pipe Server per Test Application in dotnet test #42785
    Area-DotNet Test, untriaged
  • Revert "Replace obsolete nuget api in Microsoft.DotNet.PackageValidation" #42648
    untriaged, Area-ApiCompat
  • Fix GetTargetPath hook point #42812
    untriaged, Area-ApiCompat
  • [release/9.0.1xx-rc1] Fix the cppcli tests by upgrading to preview 7 in stage 0 #42823
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Updated

  • Remove the install of all runtimes 5.0 and below. #42327
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update the loc build to target 9.0.1xx #42746
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Alpha Branding #42743
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • add signature VerifySigning for dotnet tools #39268
    Area-Tools
  • Temporary fix for the cppcli tests #42811
    untriaged, Area-NetSDK
  • Extend `dotnet run` to invoke a run-command-producing Target #42240
  • Permit workload restore to work with new global.json #42606
    untriaged, Area-Workloads
  • Send "workload set not installed" messages #42683
    untriaged, Area-Workloads
  • Enable 9.0.1xx branch for SDKDiffTests and LicenseScanTest #42784
    untriaged, Area-CodeFlow
  • Backport of auditSources fix #42800
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [release/9.0.1xx] Enable tab-completion for nuget package versions #42777
    untriaged, Area-CodeFlow
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.4xx' => 'main' #42736
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/9.0.1xx' => 'main' #42807
    untriaged, Area-CodeFlow
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.3xx' => 'release/8.0.4xx' #42739
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Branch Lockdown

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-08-19
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • `InvalidOperationException` in `SemanticTokensHelpers` when applying embedded classification on verbatim string #74809
  • Reference highlighting doesn't work from primary constructor base call constructor call #74804
  • Reference highlighting doesn't work for some types from constructor expression #74803
  • Microsoft.VisualStudio.LanguageServices.DevKit.csproj attempted to copy files to output directory during design time build #74801

Closed

  • CS8602 should look deeper ("Dereference possibly null reference") #74797

PullRequests

Created

  • Added handler for Razor Endpoint #74815
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged, VSCode
  • Remove dependency on deprecated ref package #74814
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, VSCode
  • Optimize usage of `Stack<T>` in SyntaxNavigator #74813
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged
  • Only copy devkit assemblies for unit tests when doing a real build #74812
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update dartlab pipeline #74811
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Communicate with OOP process to determine if an AnalyzerReference has analyzers or source generators. #74810
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Semantic snippets tests #74808
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged, VSCode
  • Use more specific checks for skipping work for unused usings #74807
    Area-Analyzers, untriaged, VSCode
  • Allow ref enumerators in async/iterator methods #74800
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Ref/Unsafe in Iterators/Async

Merged

  • Move to basic ref assemblies for net20 #74802
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • Move to basic ref assemblies for net40 #74796
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, VSCode, Next
  • Stylistic cleanup of some solution explorer code #74806
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Prioritize original user symbol in FAR results above cascaded symbols. #74805
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode, Next
  • Add file watchers for analyzer references #74745
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode, Next

Updated

  • Async rename commit #74794
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Needs UX Triage
  • Reduce allocations from newline information allocated by ChangedText.GetLinesCore #74728
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Fix allow ref like types for synthesized TypeParameterSymbols in Ad-Hoc Delegates #74714
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged
  • Load analyzers and generators in isolated ALCs in our OOP process #74780
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Optimize single spread collection expression for `List<T>` #74769
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged
  • Update LSP Protocol Types #73911
    Area-Infrastructure, Community, untriaged, VSCode
  • Reduce allocations in CSharpSyntaxFacts.AppendMembers (again) #74790
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Field-backed properties: update uses of IsAutoProperty #74798
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Make host outputs public #74750
    Area-Compilers, Needs API Review

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-08-19
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Helix failure `EPT_S_NOT_REGISTERED` #57416
  • Perf improvement: plaintext #57415
  • Crash with "munmap_chunk(): invalid pointer" error #57412
  • MacOSCertificateManager not aborting on failure to write cert to profile folder #57410
    .NET 10 Planning
  • [Balzor]PersistentComponentState.RegisterOnPersisting(Func<Task> callback, IComponentRenderMode? renderMode) - RenderMode seems ignored #57405
  • [Blazor] Provide an option to perform streaming rendering only on initial navigation on a per-component basis. #57399
    Backlog
  • `dotnet dev-certs https` fails on macOS Sequoia #57398

Closed

  • Calling external .dll fails after upgrading to .NET 8 #52761
  • Wrong http status code if CreatedResult in Put methods #57189
  • Perf regression: endpoint, fortunes, updates #57395
  • Perf improvement: fortunes, fortunes #57397
  • Quarantining `BlazorWasmHostedTemplate_AzureActiveDirectoryTemplate_Works` #37782
    9.0-rc2
  • FileUpload: Did not receive any data in the allotted time. #38842
    9.0-rc2
  • AuthorizationHandler called twice when using a global filter #57348
  • StreamRendering partial DOM Preservation #57358
  • VS-CODE HTTP launch configuration trusted certificate required #56853
  • Perf regression: plaintext #57389

PullRequests

Created

  • [DO NOT MERGE] Try to diagnose #57416 #57418
    area-dataprotection
  • Removing unsafe code in BufferExtensions #57417
    community-contribution, area-networking
  • Quarantine CanSendAndReceiveUserMessagesUserNameWithPatternIsTreatedAsLiteral #57414
    area-signalr
  • Upgrade ws 7 to 7.5.10 #57411
    area-signalr, tell-mode, 8.0.x
  • Forward-port the Virtualize MaxItemCount added in .NET 8 patch to .NET 9 RC1 #57400
    Servicing-approved, area-blazor, ask-mode, 9.0-rc1

Merged

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/9.0' => 'main' #57339
    area-infrastructure, 10.0-preview1

Updated

  • Add `StringSyntax` to the `RouteAttribute` #57369
    area-blazor
  • Unquarantine EnhancedFormThatCallsNavigationManagerRefreshDoesNotPushHistoryEntry #57376
    area-blazor
  • Propagate PropertyInfo for AsParameters parameters #57264
    area-mvc, community-contribution
  • Retry POST_Expect100Continue_Get100Continue #57374
    area-infrastructure, HTTP3, area-networking

entry.title: dotnet/diagnostics - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-08-19
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • dotnet dump analyze threadpool fails to obtain threadpool data #4803
    9.0.0
  • GCDump requires client-side symbol lookup for native AOT #4856
  • Docs/test updates/migration guidance for new runtime metrics in dotnet-counters #4806
    9.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • dotnet-counters: Support EventCounter prefix + remove known data #4871

Updated

  • Add support for MSFZ/PDZ files #4868
  • WIP [Test] Reenable EventPipeSessionTests #4866

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-08-19
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [Android] Add Android LoadImageFromFont benchmark and enable verbose Glide logging #24320
    .NET 8 SR9
  • RelativeSource Binding Does Not Work For PlatformBehaviors (MCT Touch Behavior) #24313
  • Making previously hidden Border visible has a "jelly effect" on iOS #24311
  • [Windows] Optimize WrapperView #24309
    .NET 8 SR9
  • ListView with DataTemplate: rendering and scrolling broken on iOS #24308
  • Crash on NullReferenceException with measurement cells in CollectionView #24304
    .NET 8 SR9
  • Issue with iOS Application Icon: App Store Publishing Failed - AppIcon Missing (Asset Validation Error) #24300

Closed

  • Fix CollectionScrollToGroupWorks #24270
    .NET 8 SR9
  • System.TypeLoadException (System.Reflection.AssemblySignatureKeyAttribute) when debugging on iOS #24283
  • Localizing strings in iOS Info.Plist not working after updating to MAUI 8.0.80 #24302
  • Line break modes are not working on html text type #24298
  • FontImageSource renders slow on Android in ImageButton and Image #22757
  • Improve Screenshot API on Windows to allow for WebView screenshots #14825
    .NET 8 SR9
  • MAUI - AbsoluteLayout has 3 problems - SetLayoutBounds, Add and RaiseChild #12069
    Backlog

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix cake script to generate screenshots locally #24319

    community ✨

Merged

Updated

    platform/android 🤖, i/regression

    community ✨
  • [Testing] moved FlyoutHeaderAdaptsToMinimumHeight to appium #24294

    area-docs
  • [Windows] Optimize `WrapperView` #24281
    community ✨
  • [iOS] Bugfix/22469 ios label crash #22487
    community ✨, area-controls-label
  • Backport maestro and artifact drop infra improvements from net9.0 #24247
    area-infrastructure
  • Null guard in `ShellFlyoutTemplatedContentRenderer.HeaderContainer.UpdateMinimumHeight` #16573
    area-controls-shell, community ✨, stale
  • [iOS] Fix Button image sizing and layout #22476

  • [Windows] Fix select-all Entry select logic #23329
    platform/windows 🪟, area-controls-entry
  • [IOS ]Fix border has an unexpected background animation #24227
    community ✨
  • Fix SafeArea adjustments #23729
    .NET 8 SR9
  • [Windows] Fix memory leak with GroupedItemTemplateCollection #23386
    platform/windows 🪟, area-controls-collectionview
  • Improve performance and stability of `BindableLayout` #23136
    area-layout, community ✨
  • Remove non-functioning code and instead throw a more helpful platform-not-supported error #23617
    community ✨
  • [net9.0] Fix loop CarouselViewHandler2 #24230
  • [Android] Allow custom background drawable with a custom handler #22573
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area-controls-entry, area-controls-datetimepicker, area-controls-editor
  • Introduce WindowProvider and add to Scoped ServiceProvider #24081
  • Port all remaining Xamarin.UITest tests to Appium #24153
    area-testing
  • 899474: Entry/Editor completed event is not triggered properly when unfocused #24207
    community ✨
  • Fixed the CollectionView GroupFooterTemplate crashes the application #24205
    community ✨
  • [Android] Ensure all controls in Layout with Search Bar are visible in Landscape Mode #24198

  • Update the mac/iOS workloads #24263

  • Fix for FlexLayout padding issue #24195

  • [Android] Prevent the tap that closes an open SwipeView from being propagated to children #24275

  • 894511 : Shell Tab is still visible after set Tab.IsVisible to false #24161

  • [XC] Fallback to reflection-based bindings for bindings with "invalid" path #24238

  • Fixed the label text from being cut off from the top when the specified LineHeight. #24273

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-08-19
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • EFCore.Tasks: Don't use --nativeaot when the build isn't using PublishAOT=true #34473
    Backlog
  • Adding Stored Procedures/View/Functions using Function within the migration flow #34469
  • Remove obsolete attributes at the start of EF10 #34467
  • KeyNotFoundException in sum of subquery with short properties #34462

Closed

  • Neater error message when context type is not explicitly specified. #33680
    9.0.0
  • Create a docs link for Migrations locking #34428
    9.0.0
  • Move method info lookups to shared internal classes #20631
  • Why is EF Core adding shadow fields on many to many join table queries? #34389

PullRequests

Created

  • Update SDK to 9.0.100-preview.7.24407.12 #34472
  • Persist `Id` values into owned collection JSON documents #34466
  • Fix ESCAPE clause for Azure Synapse. #34463

Merged

  • Add NRT annotations required for the new Newtonsoft.Json version #34470
  • Fix non-NativeAOT compiled model #34455

Updated

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/9.0' => 'main' #34460
  • Added Support for translating Array.IndexOf methods for byte arrays for SqlServer & SQLite #34457
  • Code cleanup (3) #34451
    tell-mode
